Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Admiration_01>Working hard so early in the morning!
Such amazing dedication!
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_01>Link! Is that really you?<sp:5:0:0> When did you get
out from the castle?!

I'm so ashamed... I've been on watch
duty here this whole time, and I didn't
see you at all.
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sigh_00>I've really got to get serious about my
training...
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Captain Hoz doesn't know that you're
back, does he, Link?

You should report to him right away. He's
on the gate tower at the top of the hill,
past the lower gates.
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive_01>I'm sure the captain will be just as
surprised to see you as I was!
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0201><snd:Sigh_00>It's about time for those monsters that
love the dark of night to awaken!
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Captain Hoz is going to be returning to
his original duties with the monster-
control crew.
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>I'm on guard duty here, making sure no
thieves sneak into the castle and steal
any of the <clr:0000>treasures<clr:ffff> there.
You can count on me to keep the castle
safe, Link!
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Captain Hoz has withdrawn from the
castle and is fulfilling his other duties
for the monster-control crew.
But never fear! I'm keeping watch, and I'll
make sure no thieves sneak past me and
steal any of the castle's <clr:0000>treasures<clr:ffff>.
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Understand>I might not match you for skill, Link, but
I've been training hard, and I'm pretty
confident in my abilities!
So never fear! I'm keeping watch, and I'll
make sure no thieves sneak past me and
steal any of the castle's <clr:0000>treasures<clr:ffff>.
You can count on me to keep the castle
safe, Link!
Talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Trouble>It's some kind of monster completely
coated in <clr:0000>gloom<clr:ffff>. And if it touches you,
it'll steal away your vitality!
It has strange wriggly things protruding all
over... It's a real sight.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>If it spots you, it'll try and chase you
down. Sorry, but I don't know any more
than that...
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Admiration_01>Working hard at such an early hour! Your
dedication is something to strive for!
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Understand>It's important to know as much as you can
about your enemy. Be careful!
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Captain Hoz has withdrawn from the
castle and is fulfilling his other duties
for the monster-control crew.
I'm on guard duty here, making sure no
thieves sneak into the castle and steal
any of the <clr:0000>treasures<clr:ffff> there.
You can count on me to keep the castle
safe, Link!
Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I might not match you for skill, Link, but
I've been training hard, and I'm pretty
confident in my abilities!
So never fear! I'm keeping watch, and I'll
make sure no thieves sneak past me and
steal any of the castle's <clr:0000>treasures<clr:ffff>.
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Chat>Your dedication is incredible. It'll keep me
motivated for the rest of the afternoon!
Talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>But, uh...be on your guard, OK? There's a
terrifying monster called a <clr:0000>Gloom Spawn<clr:ffff>
lurking around here.
If you see a <clr:0000>moving mass of gloom<clr:ffff>, fall
back as fast as you can!
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Admiration_01>The sun has set, but you're as dedicated
as ever. Well done!
